feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: #CoE#GZHX Change template in the app Display G/L Account Balances
entry.content: When exporting the Account Balance report, the account code and description are not split into separate columns, and the exported values are stored as text instead of numbers. The same issue needs to be fixed for all other reports. For example, when we in the Application Display G/L Account Balance, the export template of the account code is export out together with the descriptions, for example; 1123010000 - Down Payment.... We want to make it to be showed in the excel in two columns, could this be possible in the standard Cloud environment? 1123010000  Down Payment...

entry.title: Clear down payment at the time of billing in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Step 1 : Create Sales order 17000 INR
Step 2 : PGI
Step 3 : Manage customer down payment (10000 INR)
Step 4 : Post down payment 10000 INR (App-Post incoming payment)
Step 5 : Billing 
Step 6 : Post outgoing payment 10000 INR (Final Payment)

How can I clear the ₹10,000 down payment at the time of billing, or is there a specific app for it? 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: How can we review costing variants (PYR1 actual costing) in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public (Grow 2508)
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

We are currently facing some issues in the production costing process in our SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition (Grow, release 2508) system. The actual costs calculated for production orders appear incorrect, and as part of our analysis we are trying to verify every component that may influence the costing results.

During our review of production orders, we noticed that the system is using the actual costing variant PYR1 (and a planned costing variant as well). However, we have not been able to identify where in S/4HANA Cloud Public we can:

  • Display or review the definition of costing variants such as PYR1

  • Understand what parameters characterize this variant (valuation logic, costing type, date control, etc.)

  • Determine how these variants are assigned or used in production order costing

In SAP ECC, we used transaction OKKN to view costing variant configuration, but in S/4HANA Cloud Public, we cannot find an equivalent point—nor an app or configuration area that displays these predefined variants or their logic.

Our main questions are:

  1. Where can we review the definition of costing variants such as PYR1 in S/4HANA Cloud Public?

  2. Are these costing variants predefined and not editable, or is there a recommended app or configuration view to understand how they work?

  3. Which apps, configuration steps, or documentation should we refer to in order to troubleshoot issues related to production costing (planned and actual)?

Any guidance or references from SAP experts or the community would be extremely helpful, as understanding the costing variant setup is key to diagnosing our current production costing issues.

Thank you very much for your support!

entry.title: S4 Public Cloud Sales Reports Functionality
entry.content:
SAP公有云里的销售报表需要开发才能实现么，公有云中有哪些报表功能是系统自带的？感谢。

Does a SAP S4 Public Cloud customer need to develop sales reports, or what reporting functionality already embedded in S4  Public Cloud? Or any further specific supplementary information needed?

entry.title: Lease in Accounting - migration / special flow
entry.content:
Dear community,

I would have a question regarding Lease in Accounting within SAP S4 Hana public cloud edition and the calculation about the net present value/interest rate.

So we have a migration for existing lease in contracts in place. When we perform a test based on the SAP Standard procedure we´re getting in the valuation result a special flow

  • difference between net present value 341.195,38 € vs.
  • Right of Use asset value 329.544,76 €.

The difference is realated to changes for e.g. within the interest rate during the duration (history) of the contract.

So far all relevant calculations are working, but customer want´s to avoid that special flow - (just a Balance Sheet impact but still)

I was trying to post the "customer" net present value as statistical value, which is working but unfortunately, the interest rate calculation is getting totally wrong based on the standard SAP calculation in the backround.

Explanation from SAP based on this issue:

If however, the NPV is specified, the valuation will have to take that value as given, while considering the term and conditions maintained - for that calculation to match up to the NPV defined, it will automatically calculate the interest rate that is applicable.

Defining the interest rate manually AND also specifying the net present value at the same time is not possible.

So my question would be:

Does the customer has to accept the special flow postings (if all condition changes will be not maintained) or is there a different way to solve/avoid this "issue"?

Many thanks

Marcel

entry.title: Do I need to reversed the direct activity allocation, after actual cost posted?
entry.content:
Dear all,

I am testing 4I9 +4GQ.

In the mid of month, I did the direct activity type allocation to post direct labor into a WBS, and at the month end, I posted actual labor cost in to the WBS. then I think the cost was doubled when I wanna run EBRR.

Just wandering beside reversal of the direct activity type allocation, is there any other better solution to avoid the inflated cost?

Thanks a. lot

B,R

Gary

entry.title: MDI to Planon Integration delta token not matching
entry.content:
We've recently established connection with Planon with S4 HANA Public Cloud. We've managed to push/pull some data.

Then I've tried to set up the BP resulting to recreating the MDI service instance.

After updating the credentials of impacted config, we can no longer sync to Planon. Planon says they are getting a delta token not matching error. They already tried restarting their app but still no go.

2025-12-10 17:23:48,100 [ERROR] [pnlog.APP.planonsoftware.com.planonrealestatemanagementforsap.servermodule.com.planon.sap.scheduledtask.SyncVersionIdsTask] Exception occured while executing SyncVersionIdsTask: SyncService-BTP response Code: 400, message: {"error":{"code":"DeltaTokenDoesNotMatchRequest","message":"The consuming system or requested entity type and version does not match the delta token. Please only use delta tokens in the context of one consuming system, entity type and version.","details":[]}} : com.planonsoftware.platform.backend.connector.v2.MessageDiscardException: SyncService-BTP response Code: 400, message: {"error":{"code":"DeltaTokenDoesNotMatchRequest","message":"The consuming system or requested entity type and version does not match the delta token. Please only use delta tokens in the context of one consuming system, entity type and version.","details":[]}}

What can we do with this issue?

entry.title: Goods Receipt(F0843) : Consider for Posting checked
entry.content:
Hello Members,

I use SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition.
I have a question regarding ”goods receipt posting”(F0843) for subcontracted materials.
Is there a setting to uncheck the "Consider for Posting" checkbox by default in the component list of a subcontracted item?

This component is an item that is not managed by inventory.
An error occurs when posting goods receipts with "Consider Posting" checked.

I want the checkbox to be unchecked by default so that I can post goods receipts without manual intervention.

I would be grateful if you could help me.
Thank you in advance.

entry.title: S/4HANA Public Cloud - API Availability for BP Extension Fields Read, AR Payment Block Update, and P
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,
We are investigating API availability in S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition for the following three scenarios. Please answer with the specific API name if available, or clearly state if no API exists (and any alternative approaches if not possible).

Question 1: Business Partner Master Read (including Extension Fields)
・Can we retrieve BP master data including extension field values via API?
・If yes, please provide the specific API name.
・If no, please confirm that no standard API supports this and suggest any alternative approaches.


Question 2: AR Open Item - Payment Block Flag Update
・Can we toggle (set/unset) the payment block flag on AR line items via API?
・If yes, please provide the specific API name.
・If no, please confirm that no standard API supports this and suggest any alternative approaches.

Question 3: Payment Advice Document Registration
・Can we register payment advice documents via API?
・If yes, please provide the specific API name.
・If no, please confirm that no standard API supports this and suggest any alternative approaches.

Note: We would appreciate responses in the same numbered order (1→2→3) to keep the discussion clear.
Thank you in advance!

entry.title: S/4HANA Public Cloud - CDS Views Equivalent to On-Premise Tables for Sales Reconciliation Solution
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,
We are migrating an existing sales reconciliation solution from on-premise S/4HANA to S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition. We need to identify the equivalent CDS views for the following on-premise tables used in our reconciliation logic.
Please provide the specific CDS view name for each table. If key fields are known (especially for transactional data that requires joins), please include them as well.

Question 1: KNB1 (Customer Master - Company Code Data)
Equivalent CDS view name?

Question 2: BSID (AR Open Items - Customer)
Equivalent CDS view name?
Key fields for joining with other CDS views?

Question 3: BKPF (Accounting Document Header)
Equivalent CDS view name?
Key fields for joining with other CDS views?

Question 4: VBRK (Billing Document Header)
Equivalent CDS view name?
Key fields for joining with other CDS views?

Question 5: VBRP (Billing Document Item)
Equivalent CDS view name?
Key fields for joining with other CDS views?

Question 6: VBAP (Sales Order Item)
Equivalent CDS view name?

Question 7: VBPA (Sales Order Partner)
Equivalent CDS view name?

Question 8: VBAK (Sales Order Header)
Equivalent CDS view name?

Question 9: VBKD (Sales Order Business Data)
Equivalent CDS view name?

Note: We would appreciate responses in the same numbered order (1→9) to keep the discussion clear.
Thank you in advance!

entry.title: Output Management - How to send emails to mail-addresses from BUR001 relationship
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

in our scenario we have integrated S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition with Sales Cloud V2. As stated in that KBA, V2 is not able to display the email-address of the business partner in the UI. To see and use the email addresses in V2, they have to be replicated via the relationships. Therefore we would have to maintain it on relationship-level in S/4.

The challenge we're facing is: In S/4 we need the email address on Business Partner level for the use in Output Management (we're using Y partner functions to send emails to the Contact Persons). 

To summarize: In V2 we need the mail addresses in another place than in S/4...

Has anyone an idea, if we could use a CDS-View in S/4 to use the mail-address from the relationship in Output Management? I know there's a BAdI APOC_ADD_EMAIL_RECIPIENTS which might help.

BR Tobi

entry.title: Customize emails for e-invoices sent via DRC Cloud Edition
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

we have integrated SAP DRC Cloud Edition with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition.

We want to send out e-invoices (ZUGFeRD) via email. The scenario works and the invoice is sent out.

But we would like to customize the email (subject, body) that is sent out (like we could do for other invoices that are sent out via Output Management directly from Public Cloud).

Does anybody know if that is even possible and if so, how?

BR Tobi

entry.title: Exchange Rate Type Assignment per Company Code Currency
entry.content:
Hi Team 

We are in the process of implementing a public cloud solution for four localized countries, with each country operating under a different company code currency. Each country wishes to maintain its own exchange rates for currency translation, specifically for converting the transaction currency to the respective company code currency. However, I have only been able to identify an option for setting exchange rates at the global level for the company code currency.

Could you please advise on how to assign an exchange rate type for each country /  Company code, with respect to their company code currency (10)?

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud- data volume / enterprise Project WBS
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I am working on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud with enterprise projects (WBS and WBS elements)

I am looking for feedback regarding data volume (for example, a minimum of 200,000 WBS elements).

More specifically, I would like to hear your experience on:

  • Large volumes of Project master data during migration (using the Migration Cockpit)

  • Impact on Finance closing activities involving project data: performance of settlement runs, distributions, or allocations with high volumes

  • General volumetry issues related to financial projects

Thank you in advance for your feedback!

Malorie

entry.title: Analytical reporting on fiscal year using a single balance sheet G/L account in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear experts,

Customer wants to replace multiple historical balance sheet accounts (investments, provisions, retained earnings, etc.) with one G/L account per category, but each type requires different analytical views (e.g., retained earnings by fiscal year, provisions by business partner, investments by customer).
What is the best practice in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud ?

Thanks, 

Mariana

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud 2508 / Errors during the Mass Creation of Business Partner Relationships
entry.content:
Hello Experts,
we have the following issue during the migration of 2000 Business Partner relationships.
We are using the app  "Manage Mass Creation Processes - BP Relationships (F6560A)" to import BP-Relationships for existing Business Partners.
We split the import into batches of 500, but if we try to activate these, then the system activates 100 of those and then gives the following error:
"User SAP_WFRT is processing the business partners relationship XY"
The error counter varies, if you reprocess the activation, sometimes it goes up one or two, then it drops down, till it activates another 100 entries. Eventually it activates all 500, so we were able to import the first batch. All of this takes a lot of time.

Our question is, is this standard behavior ? Can the tool only import 100 relationships at once and then needs time to process some stuff in the background ? 

We appreciate and advice on how to improve this process.
Best regards
Lukas
